## Data Visualization

Consider installing the `ipaplots` for the IPA graph schema in Stata.

```{stata}
#| eval: false
net install github, from("https://haghish.github.io/github/")
github install PovertyAction/ipaplots
```

See the [GitHub repository for ipaplots](https://github.com/PovertyAction/ipaplots)
